name: FireBinder Flake
description: FireBinder Flake is a natural resin used in waterproofing formulations for the packaging of fireworks and signal cartridges. This plant-based product is derived from the Parana Pine, a tree native to Brazil. FireBinder Flake is insoluble in water, aliphatic solvents and aromatic solvents. However, our natural resin issoluble in ethanol, methanol, acetone and esters. Our product can be used as is or solubilized, depending on the intended application.
